parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The identifier of the FAQ you want to get information on.

parameters.name: IndexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index for the FAQ.

nested_items.name: IndexId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the index for the FAQ.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name that you gave the FAQ when it was created.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the FAQ that you provided when it was created.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the FAQ was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the FAQ was last updated.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket that contains the file.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the FAQ. It is ready to use when the status is ACTIVE.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that provides access to the S3 bucket containing the FAQ file.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: If the Status field is FAILED, the ErrorMessage field contains the reason why the FAQ failed.

nested_items.name: FileFormat
nested_items.description: The file format used for the FAQ file.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The code for a language. This shows a supported language for the FAQ document. English is supported by default. For more information on supported languages, including their codes, see Adding documents in languages other than English.
